issue.body:

On the other hand when the extension is disabled, we're able to see the search resutls. > > Have attached 4 screenshots: > When AdGuard is enabled: With Extenstion - Step1 .jpg & With Extenstion - Step2.jpg > When AdGuard is disabled: Without Extenstion - Step1 .jpg & Without Extenstion - Step2.jpg ### Screenshots
